mapper.select: SELECT TYUMONSYO.CHUUBUNSHONO AS CHUUBUNSHO_CHUUBUNSHONO1 ,TYUMONSYO.HINMEI AS CHUUBUNSHO_HINMEI2 ,TYUMONSYO.KYAKUSAKIBUSHO AS CHUUBUNSHO_KYAKUSAKIBUSHO3 ,TYUMONSYO.KYAKUSAKITANTOU AS CHUUBUNSHO_KYAKUSAKITANTOU4 ,TYUMONSYO.CHUUMONHIDZUKE AS CHUUBUNSHO_CHUUMONHIDZUKE5 ,TYUMONSYO.NOUKIYOTEIBI AS CHUUBUNSHO_NOUKIYOTEIBI6 ,TYUMONSYO.MITSUMORISHONO AS CHUUBUNSHO_MITSUMORISHONO7 ,TYUMONSYO.MITSUMORIKINGAKU AS CHUUBUNSHO_MITSUMORIKINGAKU8 ,TYUMONSYO.SHOUHINSOUGAKUJPY AS CHUUBUNSHO_SHOUHINSOUGAKUJPY9 ,TYUMONSYO.NOUNYUUBI AS CHUUBUNSHO_NOUNYUUBI10 ,SYAIN.SHAINMEI AS SHAIN_SHAINMEI11 ,KAISYA.KAISHAMEI AS KAISHA_KAISHAMEI12 FROM TYUMONSYO LEFT JOIN KAISYA ON TYUMONSYO.KYAKUSAKIID = KAISYA.KAISHAID LEFT JOIN SYAIN ON TYUMONSYO.TANTOUSHAID = SYAIN.SHAINID WHERE 1 = 1 AND TYUMONSYO.CHUUBUNSHONO = #{CHUUBUNSHONO1}
